    dcl_texcoord v0
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

dcl_2d s13


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:

texldl r8, c220.z, s13
mov r7, v0
add r8.w, r7.w, -r8.y
mad r7.x, r8.w, r8.x, r7.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r7.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r7.x
      mov r1.yz, r7.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    add r0.y, c4.z, r7.z
    add r0.z, r0.y, c8.x
    log r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, c8.y
    mov r0.w, c4.w
    mad r0.w, r0.z, r0.w, c8.z
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c8.x
    mad r0.z, r0.z, -c6.x, c6.y
    add r0.z, r0.z, -c8.z
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, r0.w
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.z
    rcp r0.y, r0.y

    dp2add r2.x, c8.w, r0.y, r7.x
    mov r2.yz, r7.xyww
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r2, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    mov r0.yz, c6
    add r0.x, r0.y, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r0.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, -c2.x
    rcp r0.w, r7.w
    mul r1.xy, r0.w, r7
    mul r1.xy, r0.x, r1
    mul r2, r1.y, c14

// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_7411C1C3_0.txt

mad r1.x, -r8.w, r8.x, r1.x

    mad r2, c13, r1.x, r2
    mad r2, c15, r0.x, r2
    add r2, r2, c16
    rcp r0.w, r2.w
    mul r1.zw, r0.w, r2.xyxy
    mul r2.xy, r1.zwzw, c19
    frc r2.xy, r2
    mad r1.zw, r1, c19.xyxy, r0.z
    add r1.zw, -r2.xyxy, r1
    add r3, r1.zwzw, c7.xxxy
    mul r3, r3, c20.xyxy
    mul r4, r3.xyxx, c6.yyww
    texldl r4, r4, s2
    max r0.w, c7.z, -r2.z
    add r2.z, r0.w, r4.x

    mul r3, r3.zwxx, c6.yyww

    mul r5.xy, r1.zwzw, c20

    texldl r5, r5, s2
    add r0.w, r0.w, r5.x
    mad_sat r6.z, r0.w, c19.z, r0.y
    lrp r5, r2.x, r3.xyyz, r4.xyyz

    lrp r4, r2.x, r6.xyyz, r3.xyyz
    lrp r1.zw, r2.y, r4.xyyw, r4.xyxz
    add r0.y, r0.w, r0.y

    add r0.y, r1.w, r0.y
    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0.y, c5.x

    mad r1.xyz, c9, r1.x, r1.yzww

    add r1.xyz, r1, c12

    mul r1.xyz, r1, c17.w
    dp3 r0.x, r1, r1
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x

    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.y

    mad oC0, r0.x, r2, r1
